subject: Update regex patterns in 3 files and commit
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Update test:unit and test:integration regex patterns in package.json, package.lisa.json, and typescript/package-lisa/package.lisa.json to match broader integration test naming conventions (.spec, -test, -spec).

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] All 3 files updated with new pattern `\\.integration[.\\-](test|spec)\\.(ts|tsx)$`
- [ ] JSON remains valid in all 3 files
- [ ] Changes committed

**Skills to Invoke:** `/coding-philosophy`

**Verification:**
- type: manual-check
- command: `node -e "const fs=require('fs'); ['package.json','package.lisa.json','typescript/package-lisa/package.lisa.json'].forEach(f => { const j=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8')); const s=j.scripts||j.force?.scripts; console.log(f,s['test:unit'].includes('[.\\\\-](test|spec)'),s['test:integration'].includes('[.\\\\-](test|spec)')); })"`
- expected: All files show `true true`
